en.description: Exodia Force is an Arcane Enhancement for Zaw's that grants a chance to cause a radial blast around the player, inflicting a percentage of weapon damage to targets within range when inflicting a Status Effect.

ru.description: Сила Эксодии - мистификатор для Зо, который при наложении эффекта статуса наносит урон противникам в определенном радиусе.

ko.description: Exodia Force is an Arcane Enhancement for Zaw's that grants a chance to cause a radial blast around the player, inflicting a percentage of weapon damage to targets within range when inflicting a Status Effect.
